name: Moped Mayhem
description:
Web build for convinience. performance will be much better in the downloadable standalone!

Created for Ludum Dare 38 "A Small World". Vote on the game here, if you like! : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/moped-mayhem

Fling newspapers at anything and everything, (houses, cars, dogs, etc.) you'll be surprised and amazed at what may happen!
